DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , prospective , randomize , control study safety efficacy include clinical , immunologic , virologic assessment add Ampligen Strategic Therapeutic Intervention ( STI ) HAART patient plasma HIV RNA < 50 copies/ml ( PCR ) CD4 level > 400 .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Ampligen Strategic Therapeutic Intervention ( STI ) HAART
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults least 18 year age . 2 . CD4 cell count > 400 cell . 3 . Plasma HIV1 RNA < 50 copies/ml two occasion : one within six week prior start Baseline Baseline . 4 . History virologic success suppression HIV RNA level < 50 copies/ml last nine month document minimum two time last ten month minimum three time last fifteen month patient receive HAART regiment . During four month prior start Baseline , continue Baseline 64 week study period , HAART regimen must remain unchanged contain least one follow ten antiretroviral drug : Abacavir ( Ziagen ) Zidovudine ( Retrovir ) AZT Zalcitabine ( Hivid ) ddC Didanosine ( Videx ) ddl Stavudine ( Zerit ) d4T Efavirenz ( Sustiva ) Indinavir ( Crixivan ) Ritonavir ( Norvir ) Nelfinavir ( Viracept ) Amprenavir ( Agenerase ) Only one HIV plasma RNA level > 50 , < 100 copies/ml permit four month period immediately prior start Baseline . 5 . Karnofsky performance status least 70 . 6 . The following laboratory parameter within 21 day prior treatment : Hemoglobin > 9.2 g/dL men > 8.9 g/dL woman ; Neutrophil count > 1000 ; Platelet count > 75,000 ; AST/ALT < 4.0 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; Serum creatinine < 1.5 x ULN creatinine clearance > 50 mL/min . 7 . Ability willingness give write informed consent . 8 . For female child bear potential : A negative serum pregnancy test within 14 day prior randomization . Females child bear potential agree use effective mean contraception . 9 . The patient must complete elective routine immunization ( include influenza vaccination ) eight week prior first dose study drug .
